data.title: developer Fusion
data.text:
This article was originally published in VSJ, which is now part of Developer Fusion.

Here’s the full list of winners and runners-up for the VSJ Reader Awards 2006:

Overall best development tool/environment

Microsoft Visual Studio 2005

Runners-up: Eclipse, NetBeans

Best web development software

Microsoft Visual Studio 2005

Runners-up: Macromedia Dreamweaver, Microsoft ASP.NET

Best Java tool/environment

Eclipse

Runners-up: NetBeans; Borland JBuilder

Best design/management tool

Microsoft Visio

Runners-up: Sparx Enterprise Architect, IBM Rational Rose

Best component developer

ComponentOne

Runners-up: Dundas, Infragistics

Best software reseller

Grey Matter

Runners-up: QBS Software, ComponentSource

Best development utility

NUnit

Runners-up: Compuware DevPartner, InstallShield

Best security product

Aladdin HASP

Runners-up: DESkey, WSE 3.0

Best training company

QA

Runners-up: DevelopMentor, Learning Tree

Best software development book

Professional ASP.NET 2.0 (Wrox)

Runners-up: Java in a Nutshell 5th Edition (O’Reilly), Head First Design Patterns (O’Reilly)

Best book publisher

O’Reilly

Runners-up: Wrox, Microsoft Press

Best web resource for developers

The Code Project

Runners-up: MSDN, Experts Exchange
